name: blended-info-session
description: Students coordinating around the CSC blended BS+MS info session details

events.content: Did anyone catch the details for the next CSC blended BS+MS info session? I'm trying to plan around labs.
Academic advising told me the blended info session is March 12 at 5pm in 14-250, so that should cover the when-and-where part of your question.
Do we sign up through that Qualtrics form like last fall?
We’re still finalizing the RSVP link, so there’s nothing to click yet—watch the department newsletter this Friday and the Qualtrics form will be in there.
